name: RTS x JRPG Demo
description:
Click the bottom-right button to play in fullscreen.

点击屏幕右下角按钮全屏游玩。 

One coursework of mine is to develop a game and analyse it. Please play the game and fill that questionnaire. Thank you very much.

 After playing the game, open the link: https://www.wenjuan.com/s/UZBZJveZ9s/   Fill out that questionnaire.

PS: The difficulty is not low. It is normal to fail. Welcome to challenge. Give you mystery prize if you beat the final boss and send me the capture.

我有门课是在做游戏开发，请大家帮我玩一下我做的这个游戏并填下问卷，感激不尽！

结束游戏后，打开链接：https://www.wenjuan.com/s/UZBZJvKZ6o/。填写问卷

PS：游戏难度不低，出现失败也比较正常，欢迎挑战！战胜最终Boss并截图给你神秘奖励。
